document.forum_title: Latest Europe News on One News Page
document.discussion_title: Stem steams ahead as students abandon the arts ship
document.topic_text: Stem steams ahead as students abandon the arts ship Monday, 22 August 2016 ( 3 hours ago ) Anecdotal evidence says earning capacity of arts graduates increases after five years Irish Times JOHN Leggott College is celebrating after surpassing last year's achievements and setting a new record for the college. The college has had an A level pass rate... Scunthorpe Telegraph
